Name: s.isna()
Usage: Whether there are null values existing

Name: df.dropna()
Comments: Can be applied on a series or a data frame

Name: df.fillna()
Usage: Fill missing values with a certain value
Comments: Can be applied on a series or a data frame

Name: df.drop_duplicates()
Comments: Can be applied on a series or a data frame

Name: df.reset_index()
Usage: Convert index column to a data column
Comments: A new index will be automatically added using incremental integers
